application.title: The Rabbit Hole
application.synchronizing.description: Please keep the app open on a device that's already added.
application.signed-out: You have been logged out because your session has expired.
application.offline: No internet connection. Check your Internet connection.

update.title: Update available
update.description: A new version of the client is available, updating requires a page reload

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The app is currently at an early stage of development. We do not recommend using the app to store sensitive data until further notice. We reserve the right to update user's canisters in any mode (upgrade or reinstall). Use this application only to test the capabilities of the Internet Computer.

errors.Refunded: The payment processing failed and the payment was returned the caller.
errors.InvalidTransaction: The transaction does not satisfy the cycle minting canister payment protocol. Desciption: {{ value }}
errors.TransactionTooOld: The payment was too old to be processed.
errors.Processing: The same payment is already being processed by a concurrent request.

errors.TxTooOld: The request is too old. The ledger only accepts requests created within 24 hours window.
errors.BadFee: The fee that the caller specified in the transfer request was not the one that ledger expects.
errors.TxDuplicate: The caller specified `created_at_time` that is too far in future.
errors.InsufficientFunds: You don't have enough funds. On your balance {{ value }}
errors.TxCreatedInFuture: The ledger has already executed the request.
